column2: Renewable Energy Trends in Consumption and Electricity, 2007
Table 1.12 U.S. Electric Net Summer Capacity, 2003 - 2007
1Includes total capacity whose primary energy source is MSW.
2Agriculture byproducts/crops, sludge waste and other biomass solids, liquids and gases.  Does not include tires.
3Black liquor, and wood/woodwaste solids and liquids.
Notes: Totals may not equal sum of components due to independent rounding.
Data revisions are discussed in the Highlights section.
Revisions to biomass capacity removed tires from renewable waste energy.
Source: Energy Information Administration, Form EIA-860, "Annual Electric Generator Report."
